text: nirākarippavarkaḷuṭaiya uḷḷaṅkaḷil aticīkkirattil nām tikilai uṇṭupaṇṇi viṭuvōm. Ēṉeṉṟāl, avarkaḷ iṇaivaippataṟku allāh evvita ātāramum avarkaḷukku aḷikkātirukka avarkaḷ allāhvukku iṇaivaikkiṟārkaḷ. Ivarkaḷuṭaiya taṅkumiṭam narakamtāṉ. (Narakattilum) aniyāyakkārarkaḷiṉ taṅkumiṭam mikak keṭṭatu
